main event: An object was observed hovering over Rosslyn, Virginia, which later moved toward Arlington and disappeared after showing rapid acceleration.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object was disc-shaped with a reddish glow around the edge., It made no sound during the observation., Seven witnesses confirmed the sighting., The object appeared to be under intelligent control.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with a reddish glow
